heading: Lightâ€™s Watch Dungeon Guide
content: Light's Watch is a mediocre dungeon with a valuable aspect for Sorcerer, the . However, the completion time, layout, and boss make this an annoying dungeon to repeatedly run, so only complete this once for the Renown and the aspect if you need it. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
